DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study To Assess CAT-2003 Patients With Severe Hypertriglyceridemia
DOC.criteria: Between 18 74 year Screening Severe Hypertriglyceridemia ( TG ≥ 500 mg/dL ) . If lipid lower therapy include statin , fibrates , and/or omega3 fatty acid , stable dose least 4 week prior Screening Body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 45 kg/m2 History major cardiovascular event within 6 month Screening Type I diabetes mellitus use insulin History pancreatitis
